title: "Android 12 gestures are finally getting better— here’s how"
excerpt: "Google first introduced gesture controls to its OS in Android 10, and it’s still facing teething problems with those who choose to use them. Android 12 could fix that. The most prominent change to Android has been the replacement to the back button: a swipe to the right in a small area on the left of the screen should activate it,"
